document.full_text: a tornado hit an auto sealing plant in southeastern kentucky monday, tearing a truck-sized hole into the building, but causing only a few bumps and bruises to seven of its 184 employees, officials said.
document.title: kentucky tornado hits plant, minor injuries reported
lines_and_colors: a tornado hit an auto sealing plant in southeastern kentucky monday, tearing a truck-sized hole into the building, but causing only a few bumps and bruises to seven of its 184 employees, officials said.
